snippet: Hours after the Islanders announced that their No. 1 goalie, Jaroslav Halak, would miss six weeks, they allowed a tying goal with 1:13 left in regulation.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Toronto Maple Leafs defeat New York Islanders, 4-3.
lead_paragraph: Hours after the Islanders announced that their No. 1 goalie, Jaroslav Halak, would miss six weeks, they allowed a tying goal with 1:13 left in regulation.

headline.print_headline: Maple Leafs Edge Islanders in a Shootout
headline.main: Maple Leafs Edge Islanders in a Shootout
